data: Market-GAN is a generative adversarial network (GAN) designed to simulate financial market data by capturing the complex dynamics of stock prices and market behaviors using deep learning techniques.
GAN model with C-TimesBlock architecture for capturing temporal dependencies in financial time series data
FNSPID is a financial time series prediction model that combines deep learning with statistical methods to forecast stock prices and market trends.
29.7% accuracy in prediction, 15.7% prediction error, tested on 4,775 historical data points
Transformer model with RÂ² = 0.988, high correlation with actual data
AlphaFin is a financial research model that uses Chain-of-thought reasoning to analyze stock market data and generate investment insights.
Analyzes stock price patterns using deep learning and financial indicators for decision-making
30.8% improvement in prediction accuracy, validated with backtesting
StockEmotions is a model that analyzes stock market sentiment by processing textual data from news articles and social media to predict market trends.
Uses 10,000 historical data points, 12 financial indicators, and sentiment analysis techniques
Evaluates prediction accuracy and effectiveness of sentiment analysis in financial forecasting
